#### About 

This is not the first portfolio site I have built. But this one I am the most proud of. My original site was a WordPress site. It was always a pain to make updates or add updates. 

With my my new site I decided I wanted something really simple and straight forward. So, I set out to create a static site that uses Next.Js and markdown.

The homepage is a just a normal page with a canvas as the background. I used Babylon.Js to create the animation and CSS to fix it to the background. 


#### Development

##### Full List Of Technology Used

- Next.Js
  - Used to build and export the whole site.
- Markdown
  - All the content for the site is written in Markdown files and converted into HTML through Next.Js. 
- Babylon.Js
  - Used to create the 3D animation on the homepage. 
- React
  - I use a custom React component library I wrote.

#### Design

The design of the site is meant to be minimalist, modern, and professional.
